name: A Quiet Fork in the Forest
description: You are at a fork in a dirt path. A lone bird tweets from the treetops somewhere nearby. A rotting chunk of wood that must have once been a signpost decays in the long grass. The dirt path leads to the north, south, east, and west.

look: I can hear it but can't see it.
Oddly enough, there IS a wooden fork laying where the path splits.
updateRoomDesc:fork:There is a wooden fork laying in the path.

args: You take the fork in the path. I hope you're pleased with yourself.

look: It's been rotting away for a long, long time. The single nail that holds it together is rusty but still doing its job.
It's a rusty old nail. The hole it's in is rotting away and it looks quite loose.
take: updateLook:signpost:It's been rotting away for a long, long time. It's falling apart.
You get your fingernails under the head of the nail and give it a good couple tugs. Eventually, you work it out of the signpost and take it with you.
